did.unittitle: Josephine Gomon to Presidents, Statesmen, and other public officials

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Josephine Gomon is mostly writing in protest of something, like funding private schools with public monies, Vietnam War, treatment of Vietnamese, and racial inequality. Mentions: China, Chiang Kai-Shek, foreign policy, Catholics, Abe Fortas, Commission on Children and Youth, Henry Ford, Richard Nixon, John F. Kennedy, and Romney.
